    • Method Detail

      • buildNewPath

        public void buildNewPath(java.util.Queue<int[]> corners)
                  throws PathException
        builds path along a series of points defined as corners. each point must be reachable in a straight line from preceding point. uses helper methods: setPathEntry, linkPathFromTo. assumes map contains no existing pathTiles prior to method call.
        Parameters:
        corners - queue of int[2] representing x,y coordinates of corners of the path to build
        Throws:
        PathException

      • verifyValidity

        public boolean verifyValidity()
        verifies if map is valid according to the default ruleset. returns 'true' if map is valid, 'false' otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        returns a string representing a map. # for path, - for scenery
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
